display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.

**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=q5FmWb4cMEQQ7kNvwEtT8-u&_nc_oc=Adk5HIN3ItfikAxL-uwBEWL1Rh7J9iJuB76lYS8pD3QsyKuxk5bu_8Td1k6hcVPlFvag4ew9z60783X9J2b59n8N&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=8A0cnSNUPNb3ewEv0UZKWw&oh=00_AfKk9BEEV3eP5YphgOkaWZLOz7Y91a0B5ciuqlFeptVPQg&oe=682C891D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Y7nOz7phFh8Q7kNvwFHJZqM&_nc_oc=Adktn9FO6hAdguX_70KfUszH1_dvLnhPHdoj_baBNEMe-8VM9xp3LlMDDc-hEz_7YBrWLDOAlFUaA8JL9JoZuuds&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=8A0cnSNUPNb3ewEv0UZKWw&oh=00_AfK5ay6XoyHWDKcCO_psXERebt-TDuaBr-4vvcYBHpK_0w&oe=682CA312)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=qGFpLESnFrkQ7kNvwGz_6E_&_nc_oc=AdkJo8rbSEaXSacfgf8n8Q-hCBEJNf_MRA-FV4eTi5afSpXWfCtElXRI6EkKJE9NcE_B4-NTWH-io0HNH8Bl_gnG&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=8A0cnSNUPNb3ewEv0UZKWw&oh=00_AfJHBs151khZxY5h4z7zXFsaDmRRmovOrFIHFI9K9J3o4g&oe=682CA923)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=kzvm_mNhasIQ7kNvwEBfLhx&_nc_oc=AdkIskGYdyl3QWylZ5iYBXHSnJQhFidqZvx55vii3ptDnuR5475yL0hYxMOHPjmki4Mgff-EvZQeBKS5thSlDKlI&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=8A0cnSNUPNb3ewEv0UZKWw&oh=00_AfJH-sGOCcaE6vMSZxulEUURqdPS2POaHoLtYehgOhCqXA&oe=682C9FAE)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
